update.foreach: INSERT INTO s_interaction_statistic (uid, type, follow_count, fans_count) VALUES (#{statistic.uid}, #{statistic.type}, IF(#{statistic.followCount} < 0, 0 , #{statistic.followCount}), IF(#{statistic.fansCount} < 0, 0 , #{statistic.fansCount})) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE follow_count = IF(follow_count + #{statistic.followCount} < 0, 0, follow_count + #{statistic.followCount}), fans_count = IF(fans_count + #{statistic.fansCount} < 0, 0, fans_count + #{statistic.fansCount});
